comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content:
According to the 1891 Census he was born 4 days before the census was taken and he lived at Lodge, Slamannan, Stirlingshire, Scotland with his parents Samuel and Elizabeth Frickleton ang three brothers and three sisters. His father was a coal miner.
In the 1901 Census the family was living at 2324 Moubray Row, St Ninians, Stirlingshire and apart from his parents this time he had 6 brothers, 1 sister and 1 adopted brother living with him
